properties.name: websocket.broker.endpoint.list
properties.description: A list for the WebSocket brokers for allowing frontend clients to connect.

properties.name: websocket.broker.allowed.origin.list
properties.description: A list for allowing which origin to be able to connect to the WebSocket broker.

properties.name: websocket.stomp.broker.list
properties.description: A list of prefixes for the frontend client to follow to subscribe to STOMP topics configured in the server.

properties.name: websocket.stomp.destination.prefix.list
properties.description: A list of prefixes for the frontend client to follow to send to STOMP topics @MessageMapping(...) configured in the server.
